name: Zombie Graveyard VR
description:
Zombie Graveyard VR is a Halloween-themed zombie shooter for Oculus Quest.

WARNING: This is NOT a complete game! This is an experimental prototype only!

Controls
Grip button: grab tri-revolver or axe with raycast
Trigger button: fire tri-revolver
Left thumbstick: move character
Right thumbstick: rotate view

Created using the following resources and assets:

Valem tutorial - Making a VR Zombie Game in ONE HOUR - COMPLETE VERSION - Patreon Exclusive | Assets Used document

FANTASTIC - Halloween Pack

Handpainted Axe

Stylized Tri-Revolver

Sound effects obtained from zapsplat.com and Freesound.org.
